page.title: 11A Day in Katherine's Life.
page.content: I live beside the main street in Aberlour. As I'm waking up, I hear the cars and lorries as they rumble over the man-hole covers in the middle of the road. I get up, put on my school uniform, and go downstairs to have my breakfast. I take a strawberry yoghurt out of the fridge and sit down to eat it. Today, when we get to school we begin with Art. We draw doors and paint them with different textures. We then do some Maths till break. At break, we go to the tucky and then go out to play Donkey. About 6 of us throw a ball about. Anyone who drops it, gets a letter of Donkey. First to get the whole word is out. I go home for lunch. For tea I have pizza and chips. I play with Leigh, swinging on a tree. I watch T.V. and go to bed about 11.
